products.title: Thrasher Hoodie – Dark Chocolate
description: Thrasher Burn It Down hoodie has a typical pullover hooded sweater build, with a Nasty Neckface version of the iconic Thrasher Magazine Logo print across the chest and a large graphic on the back
This hoodie is an absolute staple in any skater’s wardrobe, even reaching out into the fashion world and worn by big-name celebs, this hoodie has embedded itself into a wardrobe must-have
With a brown cotton-poly fabrication with an orange print on the chest and a multi-coloured print on the back
Elasticated and ribbed hem and cuffs
Drawstring in the hood to adjust tightness when worn
90% Cotton, 10% Polyester

products.title: Welcome Hierophant T-Shirt – White
description: Welcome Skateboards Hierophant tee has a short-sleeved t-shirt structure with a graphic print on the back and a smaller branding print on the upper left of the chest
Featuring a white garment-washed treated fabrication with colourful prints
Elasticated and ribbed neckline
100% Cotton

products.title: DC Jacket – Parisian Blue
description: DC Shoes Dagup Ripstop jacket is a windbreaker style jacket featuring a branding print and detailing on the upper left of the chest and on the centre panel of the hood
A vibrant blue and black colourway, with black and white features
Contrasting reverse nylon zip closure
Water-resistant poly ripstop fabric
Zippered stash pocket on the upper left of the chest
100% Recycled Nylon

products.title: Volcom Pants – Mushroom
description: The Volcom Frickin Modern Stretch pants are a skate-inspired design, with a relaxed tapered style, allowing plenty of room around the hips and thighs
A brown colouration with small black-and-white details

Clean finished pockets throughout
Angled darts from the upper of the welt back pockets
59% Cotton, 39% Repreve™ Recycled Polyester, 2% Elastane
